__TOC__

If you have any questions about mirroring Ubuntu or if you are experiencing problems with your mirror, feel free to join #ubuntu-mirrors on Freenode (irc.freenode.net). There are some mirror-admins in there and possibly even yours.

Available admins:
* Jeeves_ (nl.{releases,archive}.ubuntu.com)
* maswan (se.{releases,archive}.ubuntu.com)
* Znarl (Ubuntu System Administrator)

* Logs  (http://www.prevented.net/ircstats/logs/ubuntu-mirrors/)
